Text:
already uploaded and well seeded here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6716562/PINK_FLOYD_Discovery_Studio_Album_Box_Set_(2011)_FLAC
^ no problem at all but uploading duplicate files only serves to dilute the seed pool.
^Can you explain to me how it dilutes the seed pool?

It dilutes the seed pool because instead of everyone seeding one torrent, 50% will seed one and the other 50% will seed another, and so instead of all 100% seeding the same torrent, the seed pool is diluted.

Don't get me wrong, I really appreciate you sharing this with us, you upload a lot of awesome stuff, but this really does do more damage than good in the long run.
enough with the bitching, there is no rules against uploading your own version of a rip so stop the harassment of others. kthx

Not the same torrent. The previous  post, not included  the 60-page artwork booklet. 
Please seed. Thx for the effort.
